supportDesc.support: at the top of the face of pier a34, just below the breaking off of the plaster, three lines occupy- ing an area 30 cm wide × 10 cm high are incised in letters 2 cm high; also some large red letters not yet read. we can offer a text for only line 3.

div.ab: perhaps a reference to a gladiator with a sharp-pointed weapon; one is reminded of gladiators τοῖς ὀξέσιν, see tataki 2009: 640, with citations to a number of relevant works by l. robert. cf. below on T25.5 and hunting with a pike.
